item.title: Rsync Quickref

item.title: Shell Script Examples
item.description: How to find the directory of the script #!/bin/bash MY_PATH="`dirname \"$0\"`" $MY_PATH/relative/path/to/other/file pass arguments on to another script

item.title: Start Virtualbox as a Service in Linux
item.description: sudo apt reinstall virtualbox-dkms virtualbox-ext-pack virtualbox-qt virtualbox sudo nano /etc/default/virtualbox VBOXAUTOSTART_DB=/etc/vbox VBOXAUTOSTART_CONFIG=/etc/vbox/autostartvm.
